espnscrapeR 0.4.0
  • Reference

Scrape weekly NFL leaders stats from ESPN

Source: R/scrape_weekly_leaders.R
scrape_weekly_leaders.Rd

Scrape weekly NFL leaders stats from ESPN

scrape_weekly_leaders(season = 2019, week = 1, stats = "passing")

Arguments

season

character or numeric - greater than 2002
week

character or numeric - 1 to 17 for regular season
stats

character - either receiving, passing, or rushing

Value

tibble

Examples

scrape_weekly_leaders(season = 2002, stats = "passing", week = 1)
#> Scraping passing stats for week 1 from 2002 season!
#> # A tibble: 30 x 13
#>    season  week  rank name  team  result pass_comp pass_att pass_yds pass_td
#>     <dbl> <dbl> <int> <chr> <chr> <chr>      <dbl>    <dbl>    <dbl>   <dbl>
#>  1   2002     1     1 Matt… ATL   L 38-…        37       54      450       2
#>  2   2002     1     2 Aaro… GB    W 43-…        32       44      364       4
#>  3   2002     1     3 Phil… IND   L 27-…        36       46      363       1
#>  4   2002     1     4 Russ… SEA   W 38-…        31       35      322       4
#>  5   2002     1     5 Josh… BUF   W 27-…        33       46      312       2
#>  6   2002     1     6 Matt… DET   L 27-…        24       42      297       1
#>  7   2002     1     7 Dani… NYG   L 26-…        26       41      279       2
#>  8   2002     1     8 Lama… BAL   W 38-…        20       25      275       3
#>  9   2002     1     9 Jare… LAR   W 20-…        20       31      275       0
#> 10   2002     1    10 Cars… PHI   L 27-…        24       42      270       2
#> # … with 20 more rows, and 3 more variables: pass_int <dbl>, sack <dbl>,
#> #   pass_fumbles <dbl>
